questions: Does this landing page feature a clean and modern design? Answer with yes or no.
Is there a hero section on this landing page? Answer with yes or no.
Does the hero section showcase an image of the shampoo bottle? Answer with yes or no.
Is there a catchy headline that says 'Transform Your Hair Today'? Answer with yes or no.
Is there a call-to-action button like 'Shop Now' or 'Learn More'? Answer with yes or no.
Is the text in the generated picture clear and readable?  Answer with yes or no.
model_output:
yes The landing page uses a minimalist color scheme and font layout that conveys a modern feel.
yes There is a prominent section at the top that serves as a hero section with a model and headline.
no The hero section shows a woman but not specifically a close-up image of a shampoo bottle.
yes The headline, 'Transform Your Hair Today', matches what is prominently displayed in the image.
yes An orange button is present below the headline which typically serves as a call-to-action on such pages.
yes The text appears sharp and legible against its background for clarity.
